Xeem Nathalis yog paab rau kws Yausuas faib aav rua puab lawv puab tej tsev tuabneeg.
Puab tug nrimteb txij ndlua ntawm Heles moog rua ntawm tsob ntoo qheb huv Xananees moog rua Adaminekes hab moog rua Yaanias, dlhau moog rua ntawm Lakus hab moog xaus rua ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees.

Tug nrimteb pib ntawd lem moog rua saab nubpoob moog txug rua Anaus Tanpaus hab pib ntawd moog rua Hukaus, npuab Xenpuloos saab qaabteb, Aseles nyob saab nubpoob, hab tug Dlej Yauladees nyob saab nubtuaj.
Tej nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv yog: Xidis, Xeles, Hamas, Lakas, Khineles,
Adamas, Lamas, Haxaules,
Kedes, Ediles, Ehaxaus,
Yiloos, Midales, Haulees, Npetanas, hab Npes Semes: Taagnrho muaj kaum cuaj lub nroog hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig.
Tej kws has lug nuav yog tej nroog hab tej zog huv cheebtsaam aav kws faib rua xeem Nathalis ua puab tug lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg.
Xeem Daas yog paab xyaa kws Yausuas faib aav ua puab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg.
Puab cheebtsaam aav losloov lub nroog Xaulas, Esetaus, Isemes,
Sa-anpimes, Aiyaloos, Ithelas,
Eloos, Teenas, Ekiloos,
Etekes, Nkinpethoos, Npalas,
Yehus, Npenelas, Nkalimoos,
Meyakoos hab Lakoos moog rua cheebtsaam kws nyob ibncig lub nroog Yaupas,

Thaus xeem Daas lub tebchaws poob lawd, puab moog tua hab txeeb lub nroog Lases. Puab txeeb tau lub nroog lug hab tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog tuag taag hab muab lub nroog ua puab tug. Puab moog nyob huv hab muab lub nroog Lases hloov npe hu ua Daas lawv le puab tug yawmkoob Daas lub npe.
Tej kws has lug nuav yog tej nroog hab tej zog huv cheebtsaam aav kws faib rua xeem Daas ua puab tug lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg.
Thaus cov Yixalayees faib aav rua txhua xeem taag lawd, puab muab ib feem aav rua Noos tug tub Yausuas ua nwg tug
lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm, puab muab lub nroog Tinas Xelas kws nyob huv xeem Efalayees cheebtsaam aav kws ua laaj roob rua Yausuas lawv le nwg thov. Yausuas ua nroog hab nyob huv.

Tug povthawj Ele-axas, Noos tug tub Yausuas hab cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem Yixalayees tej tsev tuabneeg tuaj rhu ntawv  nug tug TSWV huv lub nroog Silaus, ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub. Puab muab lub tebchaws faib tav taag le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua Yausuas has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees kuas puab ca le xaiv ib cov nroog cawm sav lawv le kuv has rua Mauxes qha rua koj lawm.
Yog leejtwg tua yuam kev raug ib tug tuabneeg tuag, tug ntawd ca le tsiv moog nkaum huv cov nroog ntawd kuas dlim ntawm tug kws nrhav nwg tua pauj.

Nwg yuavtsum tsiv moog nkaum huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub, moog rua ntawm qhov chaw txav txim kws nyob ntawm roojvaag nroog, hab pav tej xwm ntawd qha rua cov thawjcoj. Ces puab txhaj yuav pub nwg moog rua huv lub nroog hab muab chaw rua nwg nyob.

Yog has tas, tug kws nrhav nwg tua tuaj txug ntawm roojvaag los puab yuav tsi muab nwg cob rua tug ntawd. Puab yuav tsomkwm nwg, rua qhov yog nwg tua yuam kev raug tuag xwb, tsi yog nwg chim hab txhobtxwm tua.

Nwg yuav tau nyob huv lub nroog ntawd moog txug nub kws luas coj nwg moog txav txim lossis moog txug nub kws tug ua Povthawj Hlub lub sijhawm ntawd tuag tsaiv, nwg maam le tau rov moog rua huv nwg lub nroog.”

Yog le ntawd, saab tebchaws ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob, puab txhaj tshwj lub nroog Kedes huv Kalilais huv xeem Nathalis cheebtsaam aav kws ua laaj roob; lub nroog Sekhees huv xeem Efalayees cheebtsaam aav kws ua laaj roob; hab lub nroog Henploos huv xeem Yudas cheebtsaam aav kws ua laaj roob.

Ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj huv lub taj suabpuam kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Yelikaus saab nubtuaj, puab xaiv lub nroog Npexeles huv xeem Lunpees cheebtsaam aav; lub nroog Lamaus huv Nkile-as kws yog xeem Khas cheebtsaam aav; hab lub nroog Nkaulaas huv Npasaas kws yog xeem Manaxes cheebtsaam aav.

Cov nroog cawm sav nuav, yog cov Yixalayees xaiv rua puab hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug puab nyob. Yog leejtwg tua yuam kev raug ib tug tuabneeg tuag, nwg txhaj tau chaw moog nkaum huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub kuas dlim tug kws nrhav nwg tua; nwg txhaj tsi raug tua ua ntej luas txav txim rua nwg.
Xeem Levis cov thawjcoj moog cuag tug povthawj Ele-axas, Noos tug tub Yausuas, hab txhua xeem Yixalayees cov thawjcoj ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg,
ntawm lub nroog Silaus huv tebchaws Kana-aas hab has tas, “Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes kuas muab ib cov nroog kws muaj tshaav zaub nyob ibncig rua peb tej tsaj noj rua peb nyob.”
Yog le ntawd, cov thawjcoj txhaj faib tej nroog kws muaj tshaav zaub huv puab tej cheebtsaam rua xeem Levis lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua cov Yixalayees lawm.

Xeem Levis kws yog cuab Kauhas yog thawj paab kws cov thawjcoj faib nroog rua. Tug povthawj Aloos cov xeebntxwv tej tsev tuabneeg tau kaum peb lub nroog huv xeem Yudas, xeem Xime-oos hab xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav.
Dlua le lwm tsev tuabneeg ntawm cuab Kauhas, tau kaum lub nroog huv xeem Efalayees, xeem Daas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubpoob cheebtsaam aav.
Cuab Nkesoos tau kaum peb lub nroog huv xeem Ixakhas, xeem Aseles, xeem Nathalis hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj cheebtsaam aav.
Cuab Melalis tej tsev tuabneeg tau kaum ob lub nroog huv xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Xenpuloos cheebtsaam aav.
Cov Yixalayees rhu ntawv  faib tej nroog kws muaj tshaav zaub rua xeem Levis lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes lawm.
Tej kws has lug nuav yog tej npe nroog huv xeem Yudas hab xeem Xime-oos cheebtsaam aav kws muab faib
rua Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws yog cuab Kauhas hab yog Levis cov xeebntxwv. Puab yog thawj paab kws xub lug rhu ntawv.
Puab rhu tau lub nroog Alanpas, (Alanpas yog Anas txiv) kws nwgnuav yog lub nroog Henploos huv xeem Yudas cheebtsaam aav ua laaj roob kws muaj tshaav zaub nyob ibncig.
Tabsis tej teb hab tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog ntawd tub xub muab rua Yefunes tug tub Kalej ua nwg tug lawm.
Cov nroog kws muab ntxiv rua lub nroog Henploos, (yog ib lub nroog cawm sav) kws muab faib rua tug povthawj Aloos cov xeebntxwv yog: Linas,
Yatis, Etemuas
Hauloos, Denpis,
Ayees, Yutas hab Npexeles Semes kws muaj tej tshaav zaub: Taagnrho muaj cuaj lub nroog nyob huv xeem Yudas hab xeem Xime-oos cheebtsaam aav.
Huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav yog muaj plaub lub nroog: Nkinpe-oos, Nkenpas,
Anathaus, hab Alimoos kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Taagnrho kaum peb lub nroog kws muab faib rua Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws ua povthawj puavleej muaj tshaav zaub.
Xeem Levis lwm tsev tuabneeg kws yog cuab Kauhas yog tau cov nroog huv xeem Efalayees cheebtsaam aav.
Puab tau plaub lub nroog: Sekhees (yog ib lub nroog cawm sav) kws muaj tshaav zaub nyob huv xeem Efalayees cheebtsaam aav kws ua laaj roob, Nkexes,
Kixais hab Npethes Hauloos kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Daas cheebtsaam aav, puab tau plaub lub nroog: Etekes, Nkinpethoos,
Aiyaloos hab Nkalimoos kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Manaxes Saab Nubpoob cheebtsaam aav, puab tau ob lub nroog Tanas hab Nkalimoos kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Taagnrho kaum lub nroog kws muab rua cuab Kauhas tej tsev tuabneeg puavleej muaj tshaav zaub.
Xeem Levis kws yog cuab Nkesoos tau ob lub nroog huv xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj cheebtsaam aav: Nkaulaas (yog ib lub nroog cawm sav) kws nyob huv Npasaas hab Npetelas kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv Xeem Ixakhas cheebtsaam aav, puab tau plaub lub nroog: Kisi-oos, Denpelas,
Yamus hab Enkanees kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Aseles cheebtsaam aav, puab tau plaub lub nroog Misales, Adoos,
Hekas hab Lehaus kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Nathalis cheebtsaam aav, puab tau peb lub nroog: Kedes (yog ib lub nroog cawm sav) kws nyob huv Kalilais, Hamus, Daules hab Katas kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Taagnrho kaum peb lub nroog kws muab rua cuab Nkesoos tej tsev tuabneeg puavleej muaj tshaav zaub.
Xeem Levis lwm paab kws yog cuab Melalis, tau plaub lub nroog huv xeem Xenpuloos cheebtsaam aav: Yaunees, Kaletas,
Dinas hab Nahalas kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Lunpees cheebtsaam aav, puab tau plaub lub nroog: Npexeles, Yahas,
Kedemaus, hab Mefas kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Huv xeem Khas cheebtsaam aav, puab tau plaub lub nroog: Lamaus (yog ib lub nroog cawm sav) kws nyob huv Nkile-as, Mahana-ees,
Hesenpoos hab Yaxes kws muaj tshaav zaub.
Yog le ntawd, cov nroog kws muab rua cuab Melalis taagnrho muaj kaum ob lub nroog.
Thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws kws cov Yixalayees nyob, puab muab plaub caug yim lub nroog kws muaj tshaav zaub nyob puagncig rua xeem Levis.
Thaus puab moog tua hab txeeb tau taagnrho lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob has tas yuav muab rua puab lawm. Puab txawm lug nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.

Tug TSWV pub puab tau nyob thaajyeeb quas lug huv lub tebchaws ntawd lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm. Puab cov yeebncuab tsi muaj cuabkaav tuaj tawmtsaam puab le, rua qhov tug TSWV ca cov Yixalayees kovyeej puab tej yeebncuab.
Tug TSWV ua lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua cov Yixalayees lawm.
Yausuas hu taagnrho xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj lug cuag nwg.
Yausuas has rua puab tas, “Mej tau ua txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tug tubkhai Mauxes has rua mej ua, hab mej tub ua lawv le kuv has lawm.
Txij thaus pib lug txug nwgnuav, mej tsi tso mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees tseg le. Mej ua tuab zoo noog hab ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm.

Nwgnuav mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees tub nyob thaajyeeb quas lug lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm. Mej ca le rov moog tsev, moog rua mej lub tebchaws ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj kws tug TSWV tug tubkhai Mauxes tub muab rua mej lawm.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ua lawv le tej kevcai kws Mauxes tub qha rua mej lawm has tas: hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, ua lawv le nwg sab nyam, noog nwg lug, muab sab npuab nwg, hab ua nwg teg num kuas kawg mej lub sab lub ntsws.”

Yausuas foom koob moov rua puab, tso puab moog tsev hab has tas: “Mej rov moog tsev, thov Vaajtswv pub mej muaj txag npluanuj, muaj tsaj txhu coob, muaj nyaj muaj kub, muaj tooj muaj hlau hab muaj tsoog tsho naav. Muab tej kws mej moog txeeb tau ntawm yeebncuab lug faib rua mej tej kwvtij.” Ces puab txawm rov moog tsev lawm. Mauxes tub muab lub tebchaws ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj faib rua ib nraab xeem Manaxes lawm, tabsis Yausuas muab lub tebchaws ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob faib rua ib nraab xeem Manaxes hab lwm xeem.

Yog le ntawd, Xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj txhaj rov moog tsev. Puab tso puab cov kwvtij Yixalayees rua ntawm lub nroog Silaus huv tebchaws Kana-aas hab puab rov moog rua tebchaws Nkile-as kws puab txeeb tau lug lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes kuas has rua puab lawm.

Thaus xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj rov lug txug huv Nkelilaus kws nyob ntawm ntug dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob,  puab teeb tau ib lub thaaj luj hab zoo heev rua ntawm ntug dlej.

Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua cov kwvtij Yixalayees has tas, “Mej noog kuv has! Xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua ntawm Nkelilaus kws nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees kws yog peb saab!”
Thaus cov kwvtij Yixalayees nov zaaj nuav, puab txawm tuaj sis sau rua huv Silaus hab npaaj moog tua cov xeem kws nyob saab nubtuaj.
Cov kwvtij Yixalayees txhaj tso tug povthawj Finehas kws yog Ele-axas tug tub moog cuag xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj kws nyob huv tebchaws Nkile-as.
Muaj kaum leej thawjcoj, ib xeem ib leeg ntawm cov xeem kws nyob saab nubpoob nrug Finehas moog, puab puavleej yog cov thawj ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg hab tej cuab.
Puab moog cuag xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj huv tebchaws Nkile-as,

hab has rua tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg has tas, “Vim le caag mej ua tej kev phem nuav tawmtsaam cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv? Qhov kws mej teeb lub thaaj nuav rua mej, yog mej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV! Tsi yog mej ua lug pehawm nwg!

Mej puas tseem ncu tau tej kev txhum kws peb ua nyob ntawm Pe-us kws tug TSWV tso sub tawg sub ntshaa rau txim rua peb? Naj nub nua peb raug txomnyem tub yog vim tej ntawd ntaag. Peb ua txhum luj le ntawd tseem tsi tau txaus hab los?
Mej yuav tso tug TSWV tseg los? Yog nub nua mej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV, pigkig nwg yuav chim rua peb cov Yixalayees txhua tug.

Yog mej lub tebchaws nuav tsi huv, mej ca le tuaj rua tim tug TSWV lub tebchaws kws teeb tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub. Tuaj thov peb muab aav rua mej. Tabsis mej tsi xob ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV lossis ntxeev sab rua peb hab moog teeb dlua lwm lub thaaj ntxiv rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub.

Mej ncu ntsoov has tas, Zelas tug tub Akhaas tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug, nwg tsi muab tej khoom hlawv kuas taag huv tuabsi; cov Yixalayees txhaj raug txim vim tej ntawd.” Muaj ntau leej tuag nrug Akhaas vim nwg tej kev txhum.
Xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj teb rua cov thawjcoj ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg ntawm cov xeem kws nyob saab nubpoob has tas,

“Tug muaj fwjchim luj yog Vaajtswv! Nwg yog tug TSWV! Tug muaj fwjchim luj yog Vaajtswv! Nwg yog tug TSWV! Nwg paub tej kws peb ua nuav hab peb xaav kuas mej paub! Yog has tas peb ntxeev sab hab tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV, thov tsi xob pub kuas peb muaj sa nyob!
Yog has tas peb tsi noog tug TSWV lug, peb teeb lub thaaj nuav hlawv peb tej khoom theej txhoj, tej nplej lossis tej khoom fij ua kev sis raug zoo, ces ca tug TSWV rau txim rua peb.

Tsi yog peb ntxeev sab! Qhov kws peb teeb lub thaaj nuav, yog peb ntshai nyob tsaam yaav tom ntej mej tej xeebntxwv yuav has rua peb cov xeebntxwv has tas, ‘Mej tau ua dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv?

Tug TSWV muab tug Dlej Yauladees ua tug nrim quas nruab nraab ntawm peb hab mej, mej cov kws yog xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas, tsi tau ua dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV le.’ Ces mej cov xeebntxwv yuav ua rua peb cov xeebntxwv tso txujkev pehawm tug TSWV tseg.
Peb teeb lub thaaj nuav, tsi yog teeb lug hlawv tsaj fij lossis hlawv khoom fij,

tabsis yog peb teeb lug ua lub cim qha rua peb hab rua mej hab rua peb tej xeebntxwv ntau tam tom qaab paub has tas, peb yeej pehawm tug TSWV, hlawv khoom theej txhoj hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo taabmeeg tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub. Tej nuav yog peb ua tseg kuas mej tej xeebntxwv tsi xob has tas, ‘Mej tsi tau ua dlaabtsi rua tug TSWV le.’

Tej nuav yog tej kws peb txhawj txug. Yog muaj tseeb le peb xaav ntawd tag, peb tej xeebntxwv txhaj muaj lug has tas, ‘Mej sim saib! Peb cov yawmkoob muaj lub thaaj zoo ib yaam le tug TSWV lub hab. Tsi yog peb teeb lug hlawv tsaj lossis hlawv khoom fij, tabsis yog teeb lug ua lub cim tseg rua mej hab peb xwb.’

Tsi yog peb ntxeev sab lossis tso tug TSWV tseg, peb yuav ca le teeb dlua ib lub thaaj hlawv tsaj, hlawv nplej lossis lwm yaam khoom fij. Peb yeej tsi teeb dlua lwm lub thaaj kuas zoo le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub kws nyob ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hauv ntej.”

Tug povthawj Finehas hab kaum leej thawjcoj kws sawv cev tsoom pejxeem kws yog cov thawj ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg ntawm cov xeem nyob saab nubpoob kws nrug Finehas moog ntawd nov tej lug kws xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj has, puab txhaj txaus sab.

Tug povthawj Finehas kws yog Ele-axas tug tub has rua puab peb xeem ntawd has tas, “Nwgnuav peb paub has tas, tug TSWV nrug peb nyob. Tsi yog mej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV, tabsis yog mej ua kuas cov Yixalayees dlim tug TSWV txujkev rau txim xwb.”

Finehas hab cov thawjcoj kws nrug nwg moog tso xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab xeem Manaxes Saab Nubtuaj rua huv tebchaws Nkile-as hab rov lug cuag cov Yixalayees rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas, hab pav txhua yaam rua puab.
Cov kwvtij Yixalayees txaus sab hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug. Puab tsi has txug qhov kws yuav tua hab rhuav lub tebchaws kws xeem Lunpees, hab xeem Khas nyob lawm.
Xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas has tas, “Lub thaaj nuav ua timkhawv rua peb suavdlawg has tas tug TSWV yog Vaajtswv!” Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tis npe rua lub thaaj ntawd hu ua “Timkhawv.”
Tau ib ntus ntev loo lug rua tom qaab nuav, tug TSWV pub cov Yixalayees nyob tso sab lug tsi ntshai puab tej yeebncuab kws nyob ibncig puab. Thaus ntawd Yausuas laug heev lawm,
nwg txhaj hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees, cov txwjlaug, cov thawjcoj, cov txav txim, hab cov numtswv tuaj cuag nwg, nwg has rua puab tas, “Nwgnuav kuv laug heev lawm.

Mej tub pum txhua yaam kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg lawm. Nwg ua le ntawd yog nwg ua paab mej. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tuaj mej tog paab mej tua hab txeeb tau lub tebchaws.

Kuv tub muab txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav tej aav, tsi has tej kws peb txeeb tau lawm lossis tej kws peb tseem tsi tau moog txeeb faib rua mej txhua xeem lawm. Tej aav nuav yog txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees kws nyob saab nubtuaj moog ti nkaus rua ntawm Havtxwv Meditelanees kws nyob saab nubpoob.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav ntab puab tawm ua ntej mej lug rua huv lub tebchaws nuav hab nwg yuav ntab kuas puab tsiv taabmeeg mej. Mej yuav tau puab lub tebchaws lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua mej lawm.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum noog lug hab ua lawv le txhua yaam kws Mauxes sau rua huv phoo Ntawv Kevcai lawm, mej tsi xob muab ib nqais tso tseg le,
mej txhaj tsi moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob koom ua ib nqaag, tsi xob pe lossis teev puab tej vaajtswv hab tuav puab tej vaajtswv npe coglug.
Mej yuavtsum muab sab npuab tug TSWV ib yaam le mej ibtxwm muab sab npuab lug txug rua naj nub nua.
Thaus mej lug nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, tug TSWV muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim ntab tawm taabmeeg mej, tsi muaj leejtwg muaj cuabkaav tiv mej le.
Mej cov tuabneeg, ib leeg yeej muaj peevxwm ua tau kuas ib txheeb leej ntshai hab tsiv moog, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv paab mej tua puab, lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej lawm.
Mej yuavtsum hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Yog mej tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV, mej moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob ua tshoob ua kug,

kuas mej paub has tas tug TSWV yuav tsi ntab cov tuabneeg ntawd tawm moog, tabsis cov tuabneeg ntawd yuav ua teebmeem rua mej, ib yaam le lub vuj hlua lossis lub qhov kws cuab muv tog mej, hab ib yaam le tug nplawm kws nplawm mej nrausqaum lossis ib yaam le tug saus kws nyob huv mej qhovmuag. Mej yuav raug txomnyem le ntawd moog txug nub kws mej tsi tshuav ib tug seem nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej.

“Nwgnuav kuv tsi muaj pistsawg xyoo nrug mej nyob lawm. Mej yeej paub has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tub pub ib puas tsaav yaam zoo rua mej lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej tsi poob ib lus le.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum ua lawv le nwg tej lug ib yaam le nwg ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg rua mej hab.

Yog mej tsi coj lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws cog tseg rua mej, mej moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, nwg yuav chim hab rau txim rua mej, ces tsi ntev mej yuav tsi tshuav ib tug nyob huv lub tebchaws zoo kws nwg muab rua mej.”

Tom qaab ntawd Yausuas hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees txhua xeem tuaj txoos ua ke rua ntawm Sekhees. Nwg kuas cov txwjlaug, cov thawjcoj, cov txav txim hab cov Yixalayees cov numtswv tuaj nyob taabmeeg Vaajtswv.

Yausuas has rua suavdlawg tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has le nuav: ‘Thaus u mej cov yawmkoob tseem nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Efalates saab tim, puab pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv. Cov yawmkoob ntawd ib tug yog Telas kws yog Anplahaas hab Nahaus txiv ntaag.
Kuv coj mej yawmkoob Anplahaas tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd hlaa tug Dlej Efalates hab coj nwg moog thoob plawg tebchaws Kana-aas. Kuv pub nwg muaj nwg tug tub Ixaj hab muaj xeebntxwv coob.
Kuv pub Ixaj muaj Yakhauj hab Exaus. Kuv muab lub tebchaws Edoos kws ua laaj roob rua Exaus ua nwg tug, tabsis mej yawmkoob Yakhauj hab nwg cov mivnyuas tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Tom qaab ntawd kuv khaiv Mauxes hab Aloos moog hab kuv tso tej kev siv kev npug lug rua tebchaws Iziv, tabsis kuv coj mej tawm lug;
thaus kuv coj mej cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, cov Iziv caij neeg hab tsheb neeg, tso tubrog caum puab tua. Tabsis thaus mej cov yawmkoob lug txug ntawm Havtxwv Lab,

puab quaj thov kuv paab, kuv txhaj tso fuab dlub lug quas hlo puab hab cov Iziv. Kuv ua kuas havtxwv nphau lug npug nkaus cov Iziv rua huv qaab thu. Mej paub has tas kuv tau ua le caag rua cov Iziv.’ “ ‘Mej nyob ntawm taj suabpuam tau ntev heev.

Kuv maam coj mej lug rua huv cov Amaules lub tebchaws kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj. Cov Amaules tua mej, tabsis kuv ca mej tua yeej puab. Kuv ca puab puamtsuaj taabmeeg mej hab ca mej txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws.
Xipules tug tub Npalaj kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Mau-am tuaj tua mej. Nwg khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Npe-us tug tub Npala-aas, kuas tuaj foom tsi zoo rua mej.
Tabsis kuv tsi noog Npala-aas tej lug, Npala-aas txhaj foom koob moov rua mej. Kuv ua le ntawd, yog kuv cawm mej dlim ntawm Npalaj teg.

Mej hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua huv lub nroog Yelikaus. Cov tuabneeg huv Yelikaus tawmtsaam mej ib yaam le cov Amaules, cov Pelixes, cov Kana-aas, cov Hitis, cov Nkikasis, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus tua mej, tabsis kuv ca mej tua yeej puab.
Thaus mej taabtom lug txeem puab lub tebchaws, kuv ua rua puab ntshai heev, mej txhaj lawv tau cov Amaules ob tug vaajntxwv tawm. Mej tsi tau muab mej tej neevnti hab ntaaj tua le.

Kuv muab lub tebchaws kws mej tsi tau khwv hab tej nroog kws mej txhais teg tsi tau ua pub rua mej nyob. Nwgnuav mej lug nyob huv tej nroog nuav, mej tau noj tej txiv maab hab tej txiv ntoo roj kws tsi yog mej cog.’ ”

Yausuas has ntxiv tas, “Txij nuav moog, mej yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV, muab sab npuab nwg hab muaj lub sab dlawb paug pehawm nwg. Tsi xob pe tej vaajtswv kws mej cov yawmkoob pe tim tebchaws Mexuputamias hab nraag tebchaws Iziv, mej pehawm tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb.

Yog mej tsi txaus sab pehawm tug TSWV, nub nua mej ca le txav txim sab saib mej yuav pehawm tug twg, mej yuav pe tej vaajtswv kws mej cov yawmkoob pe tim tebchaws Mexuputamias lossis pe tej vaajtswv kws cov Amaules pe huv lub tebchaws kws mej nyob nuav. Txawm yog mej yuav pe tug twg los xij, kuv hab kuv tsev tuabneeg, peb yuav pehawm tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb.”
Cov tuabneeg teb has tas, “Peb yuav tsi tso tug TSWV tseg hab moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv!

Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tau coj peb cov yawmkoob hab peb tawm ntawm kev ua luas qhev nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, hab peb tub pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg ua lawm. Tug TSWV tsomkwm hab nrug nraim peb huv tej tebchaws kws peb lug dlhau lawd txhua qhov.
Tug TSWV ntab cov Amaules kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav tawm moog ua ntej peb lug nyob. Yog le ntawd, peb yuav pehawm tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv xwb.”
Yausuas has rua puab tas, “Ntshai mej yuav ua tsi tau tug TSWV teg num, rua qhov nwg yog Vaajtswv tug dlawbhuv. Nwg khib mej heev. Nwg yuav tsi zaam txim le.

Yog mej tso tug TSWV tseg moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, nwg yuav tawmtsaam hab rau txim rua mej. Txawm yog yaav taag lug nwg tau ua zoo rua mej lawm los nwg yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj moog.”
Cov tuabneeg has rua Yausuas has tas, “Peb yuav tsi ua le ntawd! Peb yuav pehawm tug TSWV xwb.”
Yausuas has rua puab tas, “Mej ncu mej tej lug tseg, mej yeej leeg has tas, mej yuav pehawm tug TSWV xwb.” Puab teb has tas, “Peb yuav ua le ntawd.”
Yausuas has rua puab tas, “Mej yuavtsum tso lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv tseg, muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.”
Puab has rua Yausuas has tas, “Peb yuav pehawm tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hab noog nwg tej lug.”
Nub ntawd Yausuas txhaj kuas puab coglug,  Yausuas muab tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm lug qha rua puab ntawm Sekhees, kuas puab coj lawv le ntawd.
Yausuas sau tej lug saamfwm ntawd rua huv phoo ntawv kws teev Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai. Yausuas muab ib lub pobzeb luj lug teeb rua huv qaab tsob ntoo qheb kws ze tug TSWV lub tsevntaub.

Yausuas has rua puab tas, “Lub pobzeb nuav yuav ua timkhawv rua peb. Lub pobzeb nuav nov txhua lu lug kws tug TSWV has rua peb, nwg yuav ua timkhawv tawmtsaam mej, kuas mej tsi xob ntxeev sab rua mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Yausuas txawm kuas puab rov qaab moog tsev, hab puab nyag rov moog rua nyag lub tebchaws lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd, Noos tug tub Yausuas kws yog tug TSWV tug tubkhai tuag thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj ib puas kaum xyoo.
Puab muab nwg log rua huv nwg thaaj aav ntawm lub nroog Tinas Xelas kws ua laaj roob huv tebchaws Efalayees kws nyob ntawm lub Roob Nkasas saab qaumteb.

Tam kws Yausuas tseem ua neej nyob hab tom qaab kws nwg tuag lawm lossis ntu kws cov thawjcoj tam ntawd tseem ua neej nyob, cov Yixalayees pehawm tug TSWV xwb, hab puab pum txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau ua paab cov Yixalayees.

Yauxej lub cev kws cov Yixalayees coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, puab muab log rua ntawm Sekhees, huv thaaj aav kws Yakhauj muab ib puas dlaim nyaj yuav ntawm Hamaules kws yog Sekhees txiv lug. Thaaj aav ntawd yog Yauxej cov xeebntxwv tug.
Aloos tug tub Ele-axas tuag hab puab muab nwg log rua ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as kws muab tu rua nwg tug tub Finehas huv tebchaws Efalayees kws ua laaj roob.
